text: Any willful interference with the Chief of Police, or with any member of the police force, by any of the persons named in § 5-117.01, while in official and due discharge of duty, shall be punishable as a misdemeanor.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 4-150.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Major and Superintendent of Metropolitan Police abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 5-105.01.

DC CODE § 5-117.04

Current through December 11, 2012
